title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Project-Based Curriculum Development Management Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Mathematics Curriculum Management Experience and Basic Qualitative Research Method Understanding
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: They can design a curriculum development management process (planning-organizing-implementing-evaluating) using a PBL approach
They can write a field needs analysis and feasibility evaluation report for improving math curricula
They can develop and execute curriculum operation strategies through collaboration with diverse stakeholders
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
